NotFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

Error.title: Something Went Wrong
Error.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

categoryDescriptions.valves: Quality control valves and gate valves

HomePage.title: B2B Global Trade
HomePage.description: Your trusted partner for international trade solutions. We connect businesses across the globe with efficiency and reliability.

hero.title: Industrial Solutions for Global Markets
hero.subtitle: We provide high-quality industrial pumps, valves, and piping systems to businesses worldwide. Partner with us for reliable products and exceptional service.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.description: Learn more about our company and mission.
AboutPage.content: We are a leading provider of international trade solutions, helping businesses expand their global reach since 2010. Our team of experts brings decades of combined experience in logistics, supply chain management, and cross-border commerce.

NewsPage.title: Latest News
NewsPage.description: Stay updated with our latest announcements and industry insights.

expansion-2024.title: Global Expansion 2024
expansion-2024.excerpt: Announcing our expansion into new markets across Asia and Europe.
expansion-2024.content: We are excited to announce our strategic expansion into key markets across Asia and Europe. This growth initiative will enable us to better serve our global clients and strengthen our international trade network.

partnership-announcement.title: Strategic Partnership Announcement
partnership-announcement.excerpt: New partnership to enhance our logistics capabilities.
partnership-announcement.content: We have formed a strategic partnership with leading logistics providers to enhance our service offerings. This collaboration will streamline operations and reduce delivery times for our clients.

industry-award.title: Industry Excellence Award
industry-award.excerpt: Recognized for outstanding service in international trade.
industry-award.content: We are honored to receive the Industry Excellence Award for our contributions to international trade. This recognition reflects our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction.

CasesPage.title: Case Studies
CasesPage.description: Discover how we help businesses succeed in global trade.

logistics-optimization.title: Logistics Optimization for Fortune 500
logistics-optimization.excerpt: Reduced shipping costs by 30% through route optimization.
logistics-optimization.content: By implementing our advanced logistics optimization solutions, we helped a Fortune 500 company reduce their international shipping costs by 30% while improving delivery times by 25%.

supply-chain-integration.title: Supply Chain Integration
supply-chain-integration.excerpt: Seamless integration of multi-region supply chains.
supply-chain-integration.content: We designed and implemented a comprehensive supply chain integration solution that connected manufacturing facilities across three continents, resulting in improved inventory management and reduced lead times.

global-expansion.title: Retail Global Expansion
global-expansion.excerpt: Enabling rapid market entry into 15 new countries.
global-expansion.content: Our team supported a major retail brand in their global expansion, helping them establish operations in 15 new countries within 18 months. The project included customs compliance, logistics setup, and local partner integration.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.description: Get in touch with our team. We'd love to hear from you.

modal.title: Contact Us
modal.description: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.

form.name: Name
form.success_message: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.

errors.validation_error: Please check the form and try again.
errors.rate_limited: Too many requests. Please try again later.
errors.turnstile_failed: Security check failed. Please refresh and try again.
errors.server_error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

ThankYouPage.title: Thank You!
ThankYouPage.description: Your message has been received. We will get back to you within 24-48 business hours.

Footer.description: Your trusted partner for international trade solutions, connecting businesses across the globe with efficiency and reliability.

BlogPage.title: Blog
BlogPage.description: Industry insights, news, and best practices for manufacturing and global trade.
BlogPage.noPosts: No articles available yet. Check back soon!

ProductsPage.title: Our Products
ProductsPage.description: Explore our comprehensive range of industrial equipment and solutions.

WhatsApp.defaultMessage: Hi, I'm interested in learning more about your products and services.
WhatsApp.productInquiry: Hi, I'm interested in {productName}. Can you provide more details and pricing?

centrifugal-pump-pro.name: Centrifugal Pump Pro
centrifugal-pump-pro.description: High-efficiency centrifugal pump designed for demanding industrial applications. Features corrosion-resistant construction and variable speed control.

vertical-turbine-pump.name: Vertical Turbine Pump
vertical-turbine-pump.description: Multi-stage vertical turbine pump ideal for deep well applications and high-pressure water supply systems.

gate-valve-hd.name: Gate Valve HD
gate-valve-hd.description: Heavy-duty gate valve with excellent sealing performance for high-pressure pipeline applications.

butterfly-valve-xl.name: Butterfly Valve XL
butterfly-valve-xl.description: Extra-large butterfly valve with quick operation and reliable sealing for industrial flow control.

ss-welded-pipe.name: SS Welded Pipe
ss-welded-pipe.description: Premium stainless steel welded pipe for sanitary and industrial applications with superior corrosion resistance.

hdpe-pressure-pipe.name: HDPE Pressure Pipe
hdpe-pressure-pipe.description: High-density polyethylene pipe for water supply and gas distribution with excellent flexibility and durability.

stainless-elbow-90.name: Stainless Elbow 90°
stainless-elbow-90.description: Precision-engineered 90-degree stainless steel elbow for smooth flow transitions in piping systems.

carbon-steel-flange.name: Carbon Steel Flange
carbon-steel-flange.description: High-strength carbon steel flange for secure pipe connections in industrial and petrochemical applications.

pressure-gauge-industrial.name: Industrial Pressure Gauge
pressure-gauge-industrial.description: Precision industrial pressure gauge with high accuracy and durability for process monitoring.

mechanical-seal-kit.name: Mechanical Seal Kit
mechanical-seal-kit.description: Complete mechanical seal kit for pumps and rotating equipment with multiple material options.
